summary: Some time in the future, man has set up colonies on the Moon, when Earth becomes uninhabitable. A madman decides to destroy the Moon colonies with his robots and automated ships, and only three people and their robot can stop him.
cast: Jack Palance|Carol Lynley|Barry Morse|John Ireland|Nicholas Campbell|Anne-Marie Martin|Greg Swanson|Mark Parr|William Hutt|Ardon Bess|Lynda Mason Green|Albert Humphries|Bill Lake|Michael Klingbell|Jonathan Hartman|Wili Liberman|Rob McEwan|Angelo Pedari|Jo-Anne Hannah|Danny Gage|Linda V. Carter|Terry Martin|Lutz Brodie|Bill Yak|Terry Sprat
title: El mundo que viene
